node.address: Calle 11, No. 26-50, Barrio La Universidad , Bucaramanga, Colombia

content.value:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Kasa Guane offers accommodations in Bucaramanga. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play pool at the hostel. Municipal Institute of Culture and Tourism is 0.7 miles from Kasa Guane, and Consulate of Spain in Bucaramanga is 1.2 miles away. Palonegro Airport is 4.3 miles from the property.

Kasa Guane Hostel features a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Bucaramanga. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

The units at the hostel come with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Guests at Kasa Guane Hostel can enjoy an American breakfast. You can play billiards at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

CENFER Convention Centre is 11 km from Kasa Guane Hostel, while Municipal Institute of Culture and Tourism is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palonegro International Airport, 25 km from the hostel.

description.description: Kasa Guane is Bucaramanga’s first and friendliest backpacker’s hostel. Located in the heart of the university sector it has with many cafes, restaurants, bars and sports facilities on the doorstep of the Hostel. We have a huge roof terrace with a bar and pool table and our own Cafe next door to the Hostel. We have 30 Mega Wi-Fi throughout the house and each bed has 17 inch hotel standard mattress for the best nights sleep. We have more than 10 years experience receiving backpackers and our aim is to help each guest get the most out of their stay with us.
